title: Bluegrass Grill and Bakery
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A breakfast food place. Come early and be prepared to wait. The interior is very small and cozy (around 6 tables) and several bar stools. Offers tofu scrambles, vegan muffins, vegan chorizo, soy yogurt, soy milk, organic coffee & juices.
